heading: HR02094
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON WOMEN AND GENDER EQUALITY TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE POSSIBLE DISCRIMINATORY INCIDENT ON THE BASIS OF SEXUAL ORIENTATION OR GENDER IDENTITY INVOLVING DENIAL OF ENTRY TO JERVI LI, MORE POPULARLY KNOWN AS KALADKAREN DAVILA, AND COMPANY TO A BAR IN MAKATI ON ACCOUNT OF BEING MEMBERS OF THE LGBT COMMUNITY
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-09-03
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02094
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON WOMEN AND GENDER EQUALITY TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE POSSIBLE DISCRIMINATORY INCIDENT ON THE BASIS OF SEXUAL ORIENTATION OR GENDER IDENTITY INVOLVING DENIAL OF ENTRY TO JERVI LI, MORE POPULARLY KNOWN AS KALADKAREN DAVILA, AND COMPANY TO A BAR IN MAKATI ON ACCOUNT OF BEING MEMBERS OF THE LGBT COMMUNITY
